name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena 2: Spirits Burst
name_original: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena 2: Spirits Burst
description: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Battle Arena 2 - Spirits Burst is an Action game, developed by Ancient and published by Marvelous Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2009.
